messages.text: friiiiends! hackillinois is doing a fellowship program instead of hackathon this year - can I direct participating students to this channel? :slightly_smiling_face: think a smaller channel than the main <#C67910KEH|general> might be a little less intimidating for beginner students - would love to hear your thoughts!
